content: when i make my tweeny weebee dolls using worsted/4/aran/10ply weight yarn and a 3mm hook they stand at 18cm tall made from the toes to the top of the head in one go with the arms crocheted on as you work other yarn weights and hook sizes can of course be used to create a smaller or a larger dolls for example to make your doll teeny rather than tweeny simply use light worsted/3/dk/8ply weight yarn and a 2mm hook this way mine stand at 12cm tall and made perfect wedding cake toppers this 11 page free pdf pattern includes doll base hair cap - with link to free pigtails playsuit - with advice on how to easily turn it into a dress sandals the name weebee comes from my youngest niece phoebe - when she was first born my daughter and phoebe s older sister couldn t say her name properly and instead called her weebee there will be more clothing for tweeny coming soon all my dolls and clothing patterns can be found here 1 in my ravelry store due to the unexpected but wonderful popularity of my weebee dolls and clothing patterns there is now a dedicated facebook group which you can find here 2 every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is error free but if you find any errors whatsoever in this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me and i will amend as soon as possible i hope you have fun crocheting your first tweeny doll ©2024 text and images by laura tegg all rights reserved finished products created with this pattern may be used for commercial sale design credit should be given to laura tegg when finished products are listed for sale i laura tegg have made every effort to ensure that the instructions in this pattern are accurate and safe and therefore cannot accept liability for any resulting injury damage or loss to persons or property however it may arise names of manufacturers and product ranges are provided for the information of readers with no intention to infringe copyright or trademarks 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/laura-tegg 2 https //www facebook com/groups/1590618731240406
